response.overview: This film is a must-see film for parents of young children and a cautionary tale for those planning a family. Roger and Doris are a married couple. They are childless and they wish for a baby. One night they wish on a shooting starâ€”and that shooting star turns out to be a toddler, a human-seeming toddler who flies through the depths of space and right into their living room.
response.tagline: Roger and Doris get more than they bargained for when a strange child appears.
response.title: Strange Invaders
